Description: Tiraz fragment in multi-coloured silk and linen tapestry, decorated with stylised classical scrolls and quadrupeds, and a lign of pseudo-Kufic inscription.
Bibliographic references: Budge 1922 / British Museum. Guide to the fourth, fifth and sixth Egyptian rooms, and the Coptic room (p.228) (Table case H, no. 26)
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.110, fig.1)
